p: The preparation of silver nanoparticles (AgNPs) is a single step synthesis 10 ml of tulsi leaf extract, prepared as described in section 2.2 above, was added to 90 ml silver nitrate solution and the mixture was heated up at 80 °C for 15 min [ 27]. The colour of the solution turned from light yellow to brown ( Fig. 1 A – C) indicating the formation of silver nanoparticles (AgNPs). The Ag NPs synthesized were separated by the process of centrifugation from the reaction mixture.
